title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 22, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - October 22, 2021
description:
Adam & Mark link up to discuss the evolving tragedy involving Alec Baldwin and they explore the similarities between this situation and former Hollywood tragedies involving Brandon Lee & Jon-Erik Hexum.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
